name: Kaiketsu Yancha Maru 3: Taiketsu! Zouringen
description:
Kaiketsu Yancha Maru 3: Taiketsu! Zouringen is an action game developed by Micronics. It was originally released in 1993. It was published by IREM. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Kaiketsu Yancha Maru 3: Taiketsu! Zouringen is available on NES.
